name: HIV Patient Died
sql:
/**
  * Name:HIV Patient Died
  * Query Type: SQL Cohort Query
  * Description: HIV patients who have died
  * Currently assuming database is only HIV patients
  * HIV Case Reporting Module already excludes patients previously added to the list
  **/

  SELECT person_id
  FROM person
  WHERE
  (
  date_created >= date(:lastExecutionTime)
  OR date_changed >= date(:lastExecutionTime)
  )
  AND not voided;
